attributes.action: to take passports off all knows peadophiles and sex offenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we think its your job to take passports off all peadophiles and sex offenders so they carnt reoffend abroad and make laws stricter on them as we as parents need to protect our children from these monsters you have stricter laws for fathers who dont pay for there kids etc nameing and shaming them why are peadophiles above this law
